title: Killing Me Softly
description: Alice Loudon has the perfect life: a loving boyfriend, an interesting job, and trusted friends. But it all comes crashing down when she locks eyes with Adam Tallis, a striking mountain climber in a black leather jacket. The chemistry between them ignites an intense, obsessive love affair that drives her to impulsively abandon her old life and marry this charismatic stranger. As long as Adam and Alice are alone, their passion supersedes any doubts she may have. But the outside world intrudes. Someone is leaving Alice disturbing notes about Adam's past. And a journalist writing a piece on Adam's heroic rescue efforts in the Himalayas has discovered a woman who is terrified of him. Just as Alice herself is beginning to be...
author: Nicci French
